role.argrole: entity or agent that issues the order

example.parse: ( (IP (ADVP (AD 而且)) (NP-SBJ (PN 我)) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 想) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 草率)) (VP (VV 下) (NP-OBJ (NN 结论)))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 说) (CP-OBJ (IP (NP-SBJ (DP (DT 这) (CLP (M 件))) (NP (NN 事))) (VP (VC 是) (IP-PRD (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 克林姆林宫)) (VP (VV 授命))))) (SP 的))))))) (PU ．)))
